ruleBookInfo.author: div.info div:contains(Author) a@text
ruleBookInfo.name: h3.title@text

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>(function(){
    var next = java.getString('ul.pagination li.next a@href');
    if (next && next.trim() !== '') {
        var full = next.startsWith('/') ? 'https://novelfull.net' + next : next;
        return full; // no webView after first page
    }

    var cur = baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/);
    var curPage = cur ? parseInt(cur[1]) : 1;
    if (src.includes('?page=' + (curPage + 1))) {
        return baseUrl.replace(/(\?page=\d+)?$/, '') + '?page=' + (curPage + 1);
    }
    return null;
})()</js>
